inscription:
Date; Signature

Inscribed in pen, in lower margin: [Elle aimait trop le bal, c'est ce qui l 'a tuée...]
medium: Watercolor and black chalk on paper
provenance: The artist (1906-1911; sold through Galerie Georges Petit to Conein); Conein, Paris?, from 1911; (Godfrey Pilkington, Piccadilly Gallery, London, until 1974; sold to MIA).
signed: [GUSTAV ADOLF MOSSA/NICIENSIS PINXIT/MCMVI], lower left center
title: Waltz of Death
